name: parcel-react-ssr
description: Example of SSR with React and ParcelJS
author: Benoit Tremblay <benoit@reactivestack.com>

scripts.dev-server: nodemon -e js,jsx,html --ignore dist --ignore app/imported.js --exec 'npm run build && npm run start'
scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run generate-imported-component && npm run build-client && npm run build-server
scripts.build-client: cross-env BABEL_ENV=client parcel build app/index.html -d dist/client --public-url /dist
scripts.build-server: cross-env BABEL_ENV=server parcel build server/index.js -d dist/server --public-url /dist --target=node6
